price: Na tungeli waongoa Njia iliyo nyooka.
footnotes: Na kwa sababu ya kut'ii kwao kwa uweza wao inakuwa hakika Mwenyezi Mungu amewaongoa kwenye Njia Iliyo Nyooka isio pindukia kiasi kwa kuzidi au kupungua.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

translations: And We would have guided them
